ygData.subject: RE: Hmm..trying to get back to cleric questions.
ygData.msgSnippet: The SSoL is a funny thing. It is probably worth more than it seems. Similar weapons for pure casters (e.g. Water Crystal staff) I ve seen selling for 100pp+.
ygData.messageBody:
The SSoL is a funny thing. It is probably worth more than it seems. Similar
weapons for pure casters (e.g. Water Crystal staff) I've seen selling for
100pp+. The SSoL is basically a mediocre weapon, but with a pretty useful
effect. Many clerics cannot do the quest (or don't want to spend time
building faction). To them, it may be fairly desirable.

I traded my first one to a lvl 30 Teir'dal cleric in return for a pair of
crested spaulders (AC11, +6sta), and I think I got the better deal. So I
would say: make your way over to East Commons or Nektulos and you may get a
good price.

Elbeno
16 times blessed by Karana
Bristlebane

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Trizzen Do'Trevan [mailto:trizzen@...]
> Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Hmm..trying to get back to cleric questions.
>
> Second: I know that prices very greatly from server to
> server, but what
> sort of price range am I looking at if I want to sell my
> shinig star of
> light mace? around 20pp, around 100pp?? I really have no idea, and
> since I am a broke cleric(is there another kind) I would like to get a
> proper amount of money for it.
>
> All thoughts would be greatly appreciated.
>
> Thanks!
>
> Eylena
> Wandering healer of Norrath.
